author: SciShow
description:
Iridescent hematite, aka turgite, is rust with a great makeup artist. This beautiful mineral shines in all the colors of the rainbow. And scientists are completely split as to why. This month, SciShow Rocks Box subscribers will receive their very own sample to ponder over.

Check out the SciShow Rocks Box https://complexly.store/rocks

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: Scientists Are Arguing About Why This Rock Shimmers
